metadata.title: CVE-2024-4076 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Assertion failure when serving both stale cache data and authoritativezone content

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-4076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
bind9-host - 1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
bind9-libs - 1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
bind9-utils - 1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
bind9utils - 1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
dnsutils - 1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.18.28-0ubuntu0.24.04.1').
isc-dhcp package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
